history.proof: intros d0 d1 H1 H2. unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *. unfold union. shelve.

exceptions.exn: In environment d0, d1 : DTA H1 : match d0 with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end H2 : match d1 with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end Unable to unify "(reconnait ?M1851 ?M1854 \\/ reconnait ?M1852 ?M1854 -> reconnait (union ?M1851 ?M1852) ?M1854) /\\ (reconnait (union ?M1851 ?M1852) ?M1854 -> reconnait ?M1851 ?M1854 \\/ reconnait ?M1852 ?M1854)" with "match match d0 with | dta d0 a0 => match d1 with | dta d1 a1 => union_1 (u_merge d0 d1) a0 a1 end end with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof, without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.```

Sovle This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall d0 d1 : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d0 -> DTA_main_state_correct d1 -> DTA_main_state_correct (union d0 d1)

Premises:
Inductive DTA : Set := dta : preDTA -> ad -> DTA
union = fun dt0 dt1 : DTA => match dt0 with | dta d0 a0 => match dt1 with | dta d1 a1 => union_1 (u_merge d0 d1) a0 a1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> DTA
DTA_main_state_correct = fun d : DTA => match d with | dta p a => addr_in_preDTA p a end : DTA -> Prop
union_semantics_0 : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (t : term), DTA_main_state_correct d0 -> DTA_main_state_correct d1 -> DTA_ref_ok d0 -> DTA_ref_ok d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1 -> reconnait d0 t \/ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (union d0 d1) t
union_semantics : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature) (t : term), DTA_main_state_correct d0 -> DTA_main_state_correct d1 -> DTA_ref_ok d0 -> DTA_ref_ok d1 -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> reconnait d0 t \/ reconnait d1 t < -> reconnait (union d0 d1) t
union_ref_ok : forall d0 d1 : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d0 -> DTA_ref_ok d1 -> DTA_ref_ok (union d0 d1)
union_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : DTA) (sigma : signature), dta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign (union d0 d1) sigma
dta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : DTA, dta_compatible d0 d1 -> DTA_compat d0 d1
u_merge_ref_ok_invar : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1)
u_merge_ref_ok : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> preDTA_ref_ok (u_merge d0 d1)
insert_ostate_9 : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (a0 a1 a : ad) (s0' s1' : state) (t : term), preDTA_ref_ok d0 -> preDTA_ref_ok d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1 -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_0 a0) = Some s0' -> MapGet state (u_merge d0 d1) (uad_conv_1 a1) = Some s1' -> a = new_preDTA_ad (u_merge d0 d1) -> reconnaissance d0 a0 t \/ reconnaissance d1 a1 t < -> reconnaissance (insert_ostate (u_merge d0 d1) a (Some (union_mpl s0' s1'))) a t
predta_compatible_compat : forall d0 d1 : preDTA, predta_compatible d0 d1 -> dta_compat d0 d1
umerge_correct_wrt_sign_invar : forall (d0 d1 : preDTA) (sigma : signature), predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d1 sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign (u_merge d0 d1) sigma
predta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall s0 s1 : state, state_in_dta d0 s0 -> state_in_dta d1 s1 -> st_compatible s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
DTA_main_state_correct_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct d -> DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true
DTA_main_state_correct_check_complete : forall d : DTA, DTA_main_state_correct_check d = true -> DTA_main_state_correct d
dta_compat = fun d0 d1 : preDTA => forall (s0 s1 : state) (a0 a1 : ad), MapGet state d0 a0 = Some s0 -> MapGet state d1 a1 = Some s1 -> mpl_compat s0 s1 : preDTA -> preDTA -> Prop
dta_compatible = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => predta_compatible p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
DTA_compat = fun d0 d1 : DTA => match d0 with | dta p0 _ => match d1 with | dta p1 _ => dta_compat p0 p1 end end : DTA -> DTA -> Prop
dta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : DTA) (sigma : signature) => match d with | dta d0 _ => predta_correct_wrt_sign d0 sigma end : DTA -> signature -> Prop
DTA_ind : forall P : DTA -> Prop, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rect : forall P : DTA -> Type, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
DTA_rec : forall P : DTA -> Set, (forall (p : preDTA) (a : ad), P (dta p a)) -> forall d : DTA, P d
dta_ref_ok_check_complete : forall d : DTA, dta_ref_ok_check d = true -> DTA_ref_ok d
dta_ref_ok_check_correct : forall d : DTA, DTA_ref_ok d -> dta_ref_ok_check d = true
prec_list_ind : forall P : prec_list -> Prop, (forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), P p -> forall p0 : prec_list, P p0 -> P (prec_cons a p p0)) -> P prec_empty -> forall p : prec_list, P p
OrdersTac.ord_ind : forall P : OrdersTac.ord -> Prop, P OrdersTac.OEQ -> P OrdersTac.OLT -> P OrdersTac.OLE -> forall o : OrdersTac.ord, P o
ssrbool.prop_on1 : forall T1 T2 T3 : Type, ssrbool.mem_pred T2 -> forall (f : T1 -> T2) (Pf : (T1 -> T2) -> T3) (P : T1 -> Prop), ssreflect.phantom T3 (Pf f) -> ssreflect.phantom Prop (forall x : T1, P x) -> Prop
ltof : forall A : Type, (A -> nat) -> A -> A -> Prop
ssrfun.morphism_1 : forall aT rT : Type, (aT -> rT) -> (aT -> aT) -> (rT -> rT) -> Prop
ssrbool.on1lT : forall (T1 T2 T3 : ssrbool.predArgType) (f : T1 -> T2) (h : T3) (Q1l : (T1 -> T2) -> T3 -> T1 -> Prop), ssrbool.prop_on1 (ssrbool.mem (ssrbool.PredOfSimpl.coerce (ssrbool.pred_of_argType T2))) (f:=f) (Pf:=fun (f'' : T1 -> T2) (h' : T3) => forall x : T1, Q1l f'' h' x) (P:=Q1l f h) (ssreflect.Phantom (T3 -> Prop) (fun h' : T3 => forall x : T1, Q1l f h' x)) (ssrbool.onPhantom (fun h' : T3 => forall x : T1, Q1l f h' x) h) -> forall x : T1, Q1l f h x
MapPut : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> A -> Map A
in_dom : forall A : Type, ad -> Map A -> bool
Inductive reconnaissance : preDTA -> ad -> term -> Prop := rec_dta : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (t : term) (ladj : state), MapGet state d a = Some ladj -> state_reconnait d ladj t -> reconnaissance d a t with state_reconnait : preDTA -> state -> term -> Prop := rec_st : forall (d : preDTA) (s : state) (c : ad) (tl : term_list) (l : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s c = Some l -> liste_reconnait d l tl -> state_reconnait d s (app c tl) with liste_reconnait : preDTA -> prec_list -> term_list -> Prop := rec_empty : forall d : preDTA, liste_reconnait d prec_empty tnil | rec_consi : forall (d : preDTA) (a : ad) (la ls : prec_list) (hd : term) (tl : term_list), reconnaissance d a hd ->...-> liste_reconnait d (prec_cons a la ls) (tcons hd tl)
MapGet : forall A : Type, Map A -> ad -> option A
MapMerge : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
M2 : forall A : Type, Map A -> Map A -> Map A
Z.min_mono : forall f : Z -> Z, Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful eq eq) f -> Morphisms.Proper (Morphisms.respectful Z.le Z.le) f -> forall x y : Z, Z.min (f x) (f y) = f (Z.min x y)
Inductive prec_occur : prec_list -> ad -> Prop := prec_hd : forall (a : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) a | prec_int0 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl0 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b | prec_int1 : forall (a b : ad) (pl0 pl1 : prec_list), prec_occur pl1 b -> prec_occur (prec_cons a pl0 pl1) b
dtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : DTA), dta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> dta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> dta_compatible d d'
predtas_correct_wrt_sign_compatibles : forall (sigma : signature) (d d' : preDTA), predta_correct_wrt_sign d sigma -> predta_correct_wrt_sign d' sigma -> predta_compatible d d'
predta_correct_wrt_sign = fun (d : preDTA) (sigma : signature) => forall (a : ad) (s : state), MapGet state d a = Some s -> state_correct_wrt_sign s sigma : preDTA -> signature -> Prop
state_ref_ok = fun (s : state) (d : preDTA) => forall (a : ad) (p : prec_list), MapGet prec_list s a = Some p -> prec_list_ref_ok p d : state -> preDTA -> Prop

```  
intros d0 d1 H1 H2.
unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *.
unfold union.
simpl.
apply union_semantics; assumption.
```

original: intros d0 d1 H1 H2. unfold DTA_main_state_correct in *. unfold union. simpl. apply union_semantics; auto.
